channel.title: Editing Shop Prices
channel.description:
I know how to do it, but My item.cfg says this for a manta ray... [code]item = 391 Manta_ray A_rare_catch. 384.961576069808 384.961576069808 446.03290933615[/code]
But in the game, in costs 488gp
Thanks, Play For Keeps

item.title: Editing Shop Prices
